item.title: Version 5.5.0
item.description:
Focusmo 5.5.0

What’s New

  • Bulk Edit Workspaces: Make changes to all your workspaces at once. Thanks to nickwolf for suggestion
  • Menu Bar App: Focusmo now works from your menu bar without needing the main window
  • Minimal Floating Timer: A simple floating timer that stays out of your way. Thanks to Ygeorgik for suggestion
  • New Getting Started: Better setup flow to help you get started quickly
  • Task List Protection: Buttons in task list don’t work during focus time to avoid unintended actions
  • Hide Seconds in Floating Timer(Experimental): Hide seconds in floating timer to avoid distraction. Special thanks to Ygeorgik for all the help

Minor Updates

  • Faster workspace changes
  • Better menu bar speed
  • Lighter floating timer that uses less computer power
  • Rename “Start Task Immediately” to “Start Selected Text as Task” for better clarity

Bug Fixes

  • Fixed task list buttons working when they shouldn’t during focus sessions
  • Improved app stability when running from menu bar only
